DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate whether non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drug ( NSAIDs ) associate acute kidney injury ( AKI ) patient heart failure . In addition , investigator would like ass risk admission acute decompensated heart failure follow exposure NSAIDs within 30 day .
DOC.brief_title: Non-steroidal Anti-inflammatory Drugs ( NSAIDs ) Risk Acute Kidney Injury Patients With Heart Failure
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion 1 . Patient 's age 20 year old 2 . Diagnosis heart failure 3 . With prescription NSAIDs ( oral intravenous form include ) Exclusion criterion 1 . With prescription NSAIDs administer topical use 2 . Patient pregnant
